mapper.select:
select
,
from miss_institution
name like CONCAT('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and address like CONCAT('%',#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and category like CONCAT('%',#{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
select b.id as id, b.name as name, b.level as level, b.address as address form miss_institution_doctor_mapping a left join miss_institution b on a.institution = b.id where a.doctor_id = #{id}
